attributes.action: Reject any proposal for the W.H.O. to claim supremacy over national sovereignty
attributes.additional_details:
Our Constitution allows for NO surrender of any part of our Constitution to a foreign power. Government can do many things, but what it may not do is surrender ANY of it’s rights to govern unless we have been defeated in war. 

There must be full and comprehensive consultation with the people by way of Referendum or General Election!
attributes.background: Reject all and any attempts to allow the World Health Organisation to have supremacy over National sovereignty in global health issues.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do, or not do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
